summary:
Charlie explores the kitchen to join his friends.
In the previous chapter J. collaborated with Mike to help him escape from the engine room and meet in the control room. However, there are still 2 friends to rescue, and it seems they have already found the next one, this time inside the factory’s kitchen.
In this new installment you will play as Charlie, who is still lost in the factory and who, with J.'s help, will have to face all the dangers that await him inside the factory. Switch players and go back to being J. whenever you need to. Explore the new parts of the factory in this chapter, meet the new Super Robot in charge of the kitchen, and take on the Mini-Rods and the ice-cream man to get the friends back together.
